name: mutant madness demo
description:
Recommended in Fullscreen BTW, if I get 5 Comments, I will give updates on how I'm doing on the game.

You're in a military base and you have to escape. The scientists were doing tests when something went wrong and mostly everybody got infected. Mutants roam the facility, can you escape before they come find you? Or do you have to go down and dirty to escape? It's up to you.
